005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.button;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
008
009import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable;
010import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableEntry;
011import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableInstance;
012
013/**
014 * A {@link Button} that uses a {@link NetworkTable} boolean field.
015 *
016 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
017 */
018public class NetworkButton extends Button {
019  /**
020   * Creates a NetworkButton that commands can be bound to.
021   *
022   * @param entry The entry that is the value.
023   */
024  public NetworkButton(NetworkTableEntry entry) {
025    super(() -> entry.getInstance().isConnected() && entry.getBoolean(false));
026    requireNonNullParam(entry, "entry", "NetworkButton");
027  }
028
029  /**
030   * Creates a NetworkButton that commands can be bound to.
031   *
032   * @param table The table where the networktable value is located.
033   * @param field The field that is the value.
034   */
035  public NetworkButton(NetworkTable table, String field) {
036    this(table.getEntry(field));
037  }
038
039  /**
040   * Creates a NetworkButton that commands can be bound to.
041   *
042   * @param table The table where the networktable value is located.
043   * @param field The field that is the value.
044   */
045  public NetworkButton(String table, String field) {
046    this(NetworkTableInstance.getDefault().getTable(table), field);
047  }
048}
